heading: AICTE SIH 2023
content: AOT (Team : Buzz 6) bagged the first rank in the AICTE SIH 2023!!

heading: Princeton Award
content: Student Start-Up Wins Princeton Award in Asia's biggest Entrepreneurship Summit st IITB!!

heading: Certificate of Appreciation
content: AOT has received Certificate of Appreciation from TCS in recognition of an exemplary partnership and collaboration.
